mapper.insert: insert into check_request (register_id, medical_technology_id, check_info, check_position, check_remark, creation_time, check_state) values (#{register_id}, #{medical_technology_id}, #{check_info}, #{check_position}, #{check_remark}, now(), '已开立');
mapper.update: update check_request set check_state = '已缴费' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select c.*,m.tech_code,m.tech_name,m.tech_format,m.tech_price,m.price_type,m.tech_type from check_request c,medical_technology m where c.medical_technology_id = m.id and check_state = '已出结果' and register_id = #{id}
select count(*) from check_request r, medical_technology t,employee e where r.medical_technology_id = t.id and e.id = r.register_id and r.register_id = #{register_id}
mapper.update: update check_request set check_employee_id = #{employee_id}, check_time = now(), check_state = '已出结果' where id = #{id}
update check_request set inputcheck_employee_id = #{inputcheck_employee_id}, check_result = #{check_result}, check_state = '诊断完毕' where id = #{id}
